channel.title: Vaccine on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Vaccine on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: In new level of stupid, RFK Jr.’s anti-vaccine advisors axe MMRV recommendation
item.description: The vote to strip the recommendation came after a day of inept discussion.

item.title: Child dies of horrifying measles complication in Los Angeles
item.description: SSPE is a rare but always fatal disease that destroys a child’s brain.

item.title: In win for infectious diseases, Florida to end all school vaccine requirements
item.description: Exposing vulnerable people to vaccine-preventable disease is just part of life, Ladapo said.

item.title: RFK Jr. defends $500M cut for mRNA vaccines with pseudoscience gobbledygook
item.description: He clearly has no idea what antigenic shift means.

item.title: Large study squashes anti-vaccine talking points about aluminum
item.description: RFK Jr. has falsely called aluminum adjuvants “extremely neurotoxic.”
